data.title: Jonathan Lethem PDF
data.meta_description:
Jonathan Lethem.pdf - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Jonathan Lethem is an American novelist, essayist, and short story writer known for blending genres in his works. Some key points:

- He was born in Brooklyn in 1964 and had a bohemian childhood, with his mother dying when he was young, which influenced his writing. 

- His first novel Gun, with Occasional Music (1994) was a science fiction and detective genre blend that brought him success. 

- His breakthrough was Motherless Brooklyn (1999), which won the National Book Critics Circle Award and brought him mainstream acclaim.
